title: Underground Wonder Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Live music venue and bar. Owner is vegan. The kitchen keeps on hand dairy-free cheese and makes breakfast-all-day food which includes a scrambled tofu, quesadilla and pizza with vegan cheese. Try the vegan reuben sandwich or the vegan Caesar salad. All desserts are vegan and 90% of products served are organic.
